text: Ksawery Jan Jasieński (born 13 September 1931) is a Polish radio speaker and voice artist. H has worked as a voice-over actor in numerous radio and television programmes. He is also known as the person whose voice is used to announce station names in the Warsaw Metro underground system."Komunikaty dźwiękowe". Metro Warszawskie (in Polish) ==References== Category:1931 births Category:Polish voice actors Category:Living people
title: Ksawery Jasieński
